ATV - Google Account: remove.SYNTAX: [ -e /sdcard/google-account ] && su -c 'am force-stop com.nianticlabs.pokemongo && rm -f /data/system/sync/accounts.xml /data/system_de/0/accounts_de.db /data/system_ce/0/accounts_ce.db && reboot' || echo 'Error! Add /sdcard/google-account first'
